data.title: Quick eats
data.text: The grilled blackened chicken salad is good. But the Zensation Zalad is awesome when they offer it! They have a good but messy kicked chicken sandwich.

data.title: Good Food fast
data.text: Great Food, Great Service Great Menu. Specials rotate throughout the year. Good choices,  Prices are very reasonable and compare with other facilities and prices are better than some.

data.title: our visit to Zaxby's
data.text: The food at this place was fresh and hot . i got the wings and things from here and everything was absolutely perfect .

data.title: light and delicious
data.text: We were able to eat well from the menu and the food was fresh and delicious. We had so much we saved some for dinner.

data.title: Drive through experience excellent
data.text: Service was fast, friendly, and accurate.  I ordered my favorite Zenzasion Zalad -- delicious.  I did not go inside.

data.title: Its chicken, thats pretty much it.
data.text: Zaxbys is a chain for chicken items.  The fingers are the best bet, followed by wings.  They sadly don't have many untraditional tosses, mostly wing style.  I always hope they will get lemon pepper, really is that too much to ask for?  Anyway, it is decent at good prices.  The milkshakes are awesome.

data.title: Best club sammich in years!
data.text:
Stopped in here tonight with a friend. I had the Club Basket, which consisted of their delicious chicken fingers on toast with lettuce, tomato (big slices too!), bacon (yummy), American cheese, and a pickle. Great combination; every bite was satisfying. Crinkly fries were good as well. Just wish I would have had the forethought to include some packets of mayo, which if you haven't tried those as a dip for your fries, you absolutely must. Ketchup is out, mayo is in. Trust me on this.

My friend had a Kids Meal of chicken fingers with Zak sauce, which serves as her choice of french fry dip.

We both enjoyed our meals and the total bill only came to $10.50 plus tax. Not too bad at all. Cheap date.

Here's a tip. Take your bag to go, and head on over to the Ocmulgee Heritage Trail, with the entrance just a block or so down the road. Find a picnic bench and enjoy the peaceful scenery while you eat your delicious meal. That's what we did, and it was a pleasant experience all around.

data.title: Fast food?
data.text: Very good for "fast food". Chicken was perfect. Really good, not too much batter in our salad and sandwich. VERY good sauce on the little sandwiches meal and bread toasted great!  Shocked to have a girl ask if we needed anything else as she was cleaning tables. Took a little while to get our food but we were not in a hurry and they DO charge for extra ranch. Sounds petty to mention but 8 bucks for a salad would think deserves a 50 cent extra ranch.

data.title: Really good chicken
data.text: I really like the House Zalad with grilled chicken, the best fast food salad around. Their chicken sandwiches are very good as well, the chicken is tender and nicely marinaded.

data.title: chicken and fries
data.text: Zaxby's food is the typical chicken and fries restaurant, but the cost in much more than it should be.  You can go to the average bar and grill and spend the same amount of money or close to it as at Zaxby, considering it is a fast food restaurant.

data.title: Slow fast food
data.text: Looking at a 300 mile drive, already dark, needed to eat and go. Co-driver in another car said we should eat on the road. I don't do that so he decided to eat with me. Our order took a while so he gave me the title for this review. The food was good, too messy to eat while driving.

data.title: Chick, chick
data.text: Great food done in the Zaxbys tradition. Clean and friendly and well worth the stop? Catch a meal on the way to catch some football at Mercer, go Bears.
